channel.title: The Best Show on WFMU with Tom Scharpling | WFMU
channel.description: The Best Show On WFMU is now The Best Podcast On WFMU! Join Tom Scharpling as he journeys through the treacherous and hi-larious world of open phones, bizarre fake guests, and even more disturbing real guests. The podcast is all of the Mirth and Mayhem, but none of the Music!
channel.itunes:summary: The Best Show On WFMU is now The Best Podcast On WFMU! Join Tom Scharpling as he journeys through the treacherous and hi-larious world of open phones, bizarre fake guests, and even more disturbing real guests. The podcast is all of the Mirth and Mayhem, but none of the Music!
channel.itunes:subtitle: WFMU presents a comedic wrangling of open phones and fake guests.
channel.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

image.title: The Best Show on WFMU with Tom Scharpling | WFMU

channel.itunes:keywords: WFMU, talk, comedy, call-in, Scharpling, Wurster, best-show, humor, pranks, radio, Tuesday

item.title: Tom speaks to the future about his place in history as his 500th show looms! De-mythologizing The Band. "Hollywood Babylon." Philly Boy Roy wants Newbridge to shine. Keep It or Dump It. Gary & the Heartthrobs debut their hit record "Hey, AP Mike!" from May 29, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: CHRIS GETHARD's worst idea ever. Atlantic City. Dumpster woes. Calls from Newbridge High class presidential candidate Mike Wilkens & his campaign manager, Kyle. Entertainer DAVE HILL, author of “Tasteful Nudes”, and comedian NICK FLANAGAN in studio! from May 22, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Rob Hatch-Miller fills in w/ guests Alex Ross Perry, AP Mike & actor Chad Raisin from May 15, 2012
item.description:
Medicine - "One More" - Shot Forth Self Living
The Men - "Open Your Heart" - Open Your Heart
Hüsker Dü - "Hate Paper Doll" - Flip Your Wig
Pillipe Laurent - "Distorsion" - The Minimal Wave Tapes Vol. 2

item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Depravity’s Rainbow filled in. from May 8, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Movies summed up in one sentence! The Best Show 100! Forgiveness! A cavalcade of classic callers! Tom’s self-coronation as the King of Free Entertainment! A chat with a human Siri! Ice Cube v/s a can of Coors Light! And MATT FRACTION checks in! from May 1, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Comedian TODD BARRY calls in for an on-air Twitter war! Mit Hamine's album finally breaks! Terrence Shropshire calls about life in "Da Bumble" and his new venture! Bath salt comedy! Mike reviews Kevin Smith's audio book! And Gary opens his mailbag! from Apr 24, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Callers draft the ultimate "Celebrity Apprentice" cast from all of history! "Hardcore Pawn" race war conspiracy! Tales of young Eric Trump! TED LEO! Grunge alternate history! "The Gary & Vance Show" returns to tackle the topic "How dumb is Mike?" from Apr 17, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Living legend CHRIS ELLIOTT in studio with JASON WOLINER to talk Eagleheart & the end of Chris' career! Calls from comedians JIM GAFFIGAN & MARC MARON! Darren Ploppleton calls to brag about his “unimagined of” packing peanuts promotion! Plus, Gary! from Apr 10, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Rockstar TED LEO talks CBGB! Trump shills for walking! Local legend Gus Brennan of the Newbridge Ratmen checks in! Then his teammate Tim Reddick calls with some shocking truths! Kevin Smith comes to Broadway! And Gene Simmons endorses Mitt Romney! from Apr 3, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: MATT WALSH discusses his new film ‘High Road’, and TV show ‘Veep’! KURT BRAUNOHLER talks about subs! Casting ‘The Best Show Apprentice’! Tom went to another Beatles convention, and things got weird! And a little taste of ‘The Vance and Gary Show’! from Mar 27, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Tom dissects Comedy Central’s daytime programming! A college DJ starts a fight! Howard Cosell stories! Pudge Palfner is back! KURT BRAUNOHLER from IFC’s ‘Bunk’ says hello! Flight rituals! And a table read for Gary’s movie ‘Midnight in Times Square’! from Mar 20, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The Rest Show with Rob Hatch-Miller, Daniel Ralston & Maggie Serota from Mar 13, 2012
item.description:
Helium - "Pat's Trick" - The Dirt Of Luck

Cappadonna - "Slang Editorial" - The Pillage

item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Spike discusses the GOP Presidential candidates! Michael K talks at Vance! Tom’s one-man performance of Bye Bye Birdie deserves a Genius Grant! A look at Kevin Smith’s Comic Book Men! Philly Boy Roy checks in! And Gary busts Mike’s beans again! from Mar 6, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Week 2 of the WFMU Marathon! Tom and HATCH are joined by TED LEO, JOHN HODGMAN and PATRICK STICKLES from TITUS ANDRONICUS! A suit from Shout Radio gives Tom his marching orders! Radio Theater! Puppets! Skeevy! Thanks everyone! We did it again! from Feb 28, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Special Marathon Week 2 Podcast from Feb 27, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: 2012 WFMU Marathon! Tom and co-host Therese with TED LEO and JULIE KLAUSNER! Gary! Vance! Duets! Insults! Celebrity Apprentice! Philly Boy Roy! Keep WFMU going! Please! We Love You! Donate Now! from Feb 21, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Special Marathon Week 1 Podcast from Feb 20, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Writer and illustrator MICHAEL KUPPERMAN is in the studio! The Newbridge machete craze! The Banksy of Human Interaction checks in! Gary takes on 3D and busts Mike beans some more! Howard Cosell meets John Lennon! And the lovelorn call in to complain! from Feb 14, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Hatch fills in for the Best Show with Daniel Ralston, Maggie Serota, Spoony, Wally Wackiman, the Greggulator, H-Man and more! from Feb 7, 2012

item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Mit Hamine can’t stop! Tom’s visit to Lipstick City! The corruption of ‘Sweet Caroline’! The premiere of Yallbegone Pond! Gary the Squirrel returns to bust Mike’s beans and review ‘Young Adult’! And Tom’s incredible impressions revue! from Jan 31, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Depravity's Rainbow with Mike and Therese filled in. from Jan 24, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Nuggets 94! Philly Boy Roy is in Weirdowood! Anonymity in Red Bank! The Black Leprechaun! Mischief Night City: The Movie! Novelist and bon vivant D.C. PIERSON is in-studio! Hawkwind Trivia! And Introducing Vance’s roommate Gary the Squirrel! from Jan 17, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: TODD BARRY calls from the gritty NYC streets! Comedian and ‘A Bad Idea I’m About To Do’ author CHRIS GETHARD is in-studio with his brother THE GREGGULATOR! Chris has traumatic stories, and Gregg has people who hate him! Sparks (and felt) will fly! from Jan 10, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The search begins for a new Best Show theme song! Callers’ predictions for 2012! AP Mike’s crazy NYE adventure! Tom resolves to ignore anonymous creeps! JESSE THORN from ‘Bullseye’ checks in! And Tom’s amazing Rage Against the Machine impression! from Jan 3, 2012
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: JULIE KLAUSNER comes to visit, and she brings gifts! AP Mike tussles with Ice-T and his Twitter minions! Tom's cousin Sherm has trouble telling the truth! A Nate Hartley update! Topic: What'd you like to leave in 2011? Happy New Year, youse guys! from Dec 27, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The 2nd Best Show Holiday Party! JOHN HODGMAN! TED LEO! DAVID REES! A secret guest! Singalongs! Also: Darren calls with some pals from the Consolidated Cardboard Party! John Roderick! Wally Wackiman returns! “A Storage Wars Christmas”! Too Much Gold! from Dec 20, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Earning your beard! A local music critic discusses the best of 2011! A rare call from Newbridge musician-slash-renaissance man David Quinnfelder! A fake Damian Abraham! And Tom gets a threatening letter from an illiterate podcaster! from Dec 13, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: JEN KIRKMAN’s airport woes! Lake Y’allbegone! The Maple Syrup Mussolini and his horrorbilly dad! Vance meets Michael K! An update on Brian Wilson’s ‘Pleasure Island’! Dumb sushi names! And Philly Boy Roy had a jolly old time in London! from Dec 6, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The return of Build-A-Movie generates many great and weird ideas! The 12 year old Canadian Glenn Beck takes on the elderly! A call about Syl Johnson’s pelvic thrusts! J. Edgar! Best Buy Black Friday craziness! Vance on Soft Machine! Drain me, Zork! from Nov 29, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The 12 year-old Canadian Glenn Beck! “It’s Dumb, But I Love It”! An overview of Stephen King’s oeuvre! Changing the past! Vance imagines an alternate-universe Genesis! Fancy Nancy! Ted Leo! And a Thanksgiving message from Larry Da Perv! from Nov 22, 2011

item.title: Ross from Newbridge Tonight reports from a hot premiere! The Greggulator declares war on Mit Hamine! A 13 year old impressionist! Vance discusses the Pink Floyd reissues! Lazer Whips! And the legendary SYL JOHNSON checks in! A weird but great one! from Nov 15, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The exciting debut of Vance, Tom’s progressive rock-loving new puppet! AP Mike has trouble operating an iPhone! A funny story about Gary Busey! Topic: I’m A Sucker! Joff in Newbridge has celebrity merch for sale! And Tom’s experiences at NY Comic-Con! from Nov 8, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Herman Cain’s Presidential Campaign! The WFMU Record Fair! Daryl Hall’s TV show! Great calls from Michael K and Spike! Darren from Work is troubled for a change! A call from JOHN HODGMAN’s book launch! And The Mike Show returns, now with Skeevy! from Nov 1, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Calls from funnyman TODD BARRY, ‘The Real Rocky’ director JEFF FEUERZEIG and wordsmith JOHN HODGMAN! Skip Dworkin has many stories to tell about Newbridge Dance Party! The Scrivener becomes the Commish! And AP Mike Day, a possible Bayonne holiday! from Oct 25, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Therese & Mike co-host the Best Show from Oct 18, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The topic is “You’re doing it wrong, fella!” Abbot & Costello Meet Hitler! A new caller turfs out hard! Fredericks on Yoga! Willy Wackoman is born! Budapest Confederates! Philly Boy Roy mourns a bad sports week! And the tale of a botched jailbreak! from Oct 11, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Trip Whiting has sizable news on Time Trampoline! Michael K takes the scenic route! The trouble with Fribbles! Larry Da Perv says the coolest thing Tom has ever heard anyone say! And the much-discussed Feltdown! Don’t miss! from Oct 4, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Tom takes a Fenway field trip and spooky Salem sojourn! Darren Ploppleton returns with a bang! Jimmy Page in a track suit! A demon field reporter is deputized! Some new callers try to turn the show into a snoozatorium but a banned caller names names! from Sep 27, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Tom immerses himself further in the dark arts! Matthew Tompkins returns and unveils the Shout! Network’s exciting fall line-up! A bizarre Fonzie novelty record is discussed! Coco from The Ettes checks in! The Dollar-Menu Dickens does it again! from Sep 20, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The welcome return of JOHN HODGMAN! A cautionary tale about devil-worship and another about hungry ghosts! More dream roles for Orson Welles! Hodgman-themed reality shows! Rat holes! And Tom is invited to his 25-year high school reunion! from Sep 13, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Tom talks about the sad, and weird, effects of Hurricane Irene! Trembling Eagle returns to defend mixed martial arts! Mayor Philly Boy Roy talks about the Newbridge hurricane response! A great landlord/tenants story! Chris Kattan trivia! Orson Welles! from Sep 6, 2011

item.title: What if more demons called in! Singing over the Pet Sounds instrumentals! Chestnut Mare –a song about a man and a horse! Topics: Most of the Least; Least of the Most! And Blaze Monroe, of the Newbridge Monroes, speaks of his many achievements! from Aug 23, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The anatomy of a buffet! A harrowing tale of high school bullying! A drunken dad at a hardcore show! Philly Boy Roy had a great time at the Gathering! Bugtussle Bill, Alabama’s most famous possum! And an appearance from JULIE FROM CINCINNATI! from Aug 16, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: VANESSA BAYER is in-studio, discussing her trailblazing dad, Offspring parodies and the poor dietary habits of SNL staff! All the regular callers get banned! And Brent Prefontaine – Bryce’s brother – offers to be the show’s Cannabis Correspondent! from Aug 9, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Therese & Mike co-host the Best Show from Aug 2, 2011
item.description:
Drive by Truckers - "World of Hurt" - Ugly Buildings, Whores & Politicians

Led Zeppelin - "Thank You" - Led Zeppelin http://www.wfmu.org/playlists/shows/41345
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: LAURIE FROM MIAMI and GENEVA are in studio! Guess how that goes! Michael K gives an extensive history of Led Zep’s ‘Presence’! The Z-Man talks Comic Con! JEN KIRKMAN! Two Southern Gents! Tom pitches his 90s musical to Laurie’s Doddy! from Jul 26, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Tom tells “A Tale of Two Boardwalks”, an epic story about Seaside Heights! “Come at me Bro” is a real slogan! Also: Drunk basketball! Ricky Gervais’ atheism! The Best Show Mentorship Program! And Spike celebrates a celebrity divorce! from Jul 19, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: The phrase “Espresso Beans for Everyone” is used! Tom intervenes in a lovers’ quarrel! Flippin’ the bird while driving! DAVID REES defends Pete Seeger! Larry da Perv explains Watergate! And taste-making blogger Mr. Furst has plenty to brag about! from Jul 12, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Tom recounts his trip to Portland, home of the noisiest hotel room in America! An essay and a poem! Philly Boy Roy talks about his latest family venture and his latest arrest! Competitive eating! Pawn Stars! I Love Lucy! A horrifying Spike soundboard! from Jul 5, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: A jam-packed show: TODD BARRY gets political! JULIE KLAUSNER is in-house! Darren from Work is in trouble! Tom visits America’s noisiest eatery! A lady tries to defend her husband’s honor! Clark returns! Woody Allen snobbery! Don’t miss! from Jun 28, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU

item.title: Documentary director JEFF FEUERZEIG calls in to pay tribute to the Big Man! DAMIAN from F’ED UP talks about his band’s great new album! Tom and the callers share their summer memories and reveal summer plans! Topic: “What Are They Doing Right Now?” from Jun 21, 2011
item.itunes:author: Tom Scharpling and WFMU
